metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for a children boy who stands with his father next to the entrance of the circus.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug book, act 3, wyrm's crossing, circus of the last days. He's just outside the entrance with his dad, Emmet.

0.speaker: Gable
0.text: Dad said the screams inside were part of the show, but they weren't, right? I bet they weren't.

1.speaker: Gable
1.text: The monster thing is scary. Will you go first? Thanks.

2.speaker: Gable
2.text: I want to see Dribbles, but I don't like the monster at the door...
